rep.text: Why is your skin so pale? Are you a Na'Hum?
Uhm, you tell me! Am I? What is a Na'Hum?
Did you just fall from the moon? Na'Hum are these weird legendary Northern creatures...
It is said they live in the lands where water is hard and rocks fall from the sky at night.
Some also say that the sun isn't warm in their lands...
I think they're all stupid. Who could live in such conditions? It's simply impossible!
Well, in some way your legends are true...
